org.jdesktop.swing.animation.demos

Class RaceBasicNonLinear

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdesktop.core.animation.timing.TimingTargetAdapter
      • org.jdesktop.swing.animation.demos.RaceBasic
        • org.jdesktop.swing.animation.demos.RaceBasicNonLinear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimingTarget

    public class RaceBasicNonLinear
extends RaceBasic
    Simple subclass of RaceBasic that uses a AccelerationInterpolator to give a non-linear motion effect to the car's movement.

    This demo is discussed in Chapter 14 on pages 363–364 of Filthy Rich Clients (Haase and Guy, Addison-Wesley, 2008). In the book it is referred to as NonLinearRace rather than RaceBasicNonLinear.

    Author:
    Chet Haase
